name: european competitive telecommunications association
goal: Assist and encourage market liberalisation and competition in EU electronic communications *** Represent competitive communications providers to key government and regulatory bodies *** Maintain a forum for networking and business development throughout Europe ***  Assist new market entrants through pro-competitive policies *** Continually reflect the dynamic nature of the communications industry
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: EU electronic communications regulation and policy *** Digital Single Market *** Gigabit society *** 5G *** Implementation of the European Electronic Communications Code *** Connected, cooperative and automated mobility
